comments_since_last_sample.body: My favorite type of wash is a white wash. I love how this turned out. Always gotta try something new and different 👍👍👍
Natural definitely! I  love how this came out beautifully 😍  Great job Christina
Sshhh, dear! Christina's 'EXPERTimenting'. (Too corny?) I would like to try this one. Thanks again, Christina
Looks  amazing.. love the black wash,  and driftwood look wash  ( my favorite) and gray washed.I think people are over farmhouse look.
Wow!  I love the black wash and this piece is stunning!
I love this!!!Black wash all the way!😊
Turned out so nice ,I’d haft to keep that one . 😊♥️
Amazing!! I never thought of doing a black wash!
LOVE this!! Great job!!
Just beautiful
Love the black wash! Very dramatic
LOVE!!! You did an amazing job! I can’t believe how clean your space and your clothes are when you paint.
Love the black wash!
Wowsa😀
You were a dedicated sander on this piece but it was worth your efforts!
I absolutely love that piece. You’re such an inspiration if I ever have a question on anything I’m working on I always follow up with your videos. Thank you so much for teaching us your techniques

Oh, I definitely like the black wash so much better. I’m thinking that this piece wouldn’t have been so hard and time consuming if it hadn’t had the oil based top coat and multiple layers of paint from the previous ‘refinish’?
Wasn’t sure about the black wash at first but it turned out beautiful!!
Stunning! Didn't know what to expect, but very impressed!!
